TextView.android:text:
Instructions:
 1)Run the Remote.exe. 
 2)First start your portable wifi hotspot.
 3)Connect your pc with mobiles hotspot.
 4)Now open cmd and type the following 
 command: ipconfig/all 
 5)Now find out your Wireless Lan Wifi 
 IPv4 Address. 
 6)Enter the ip address in previous page 
 and save it.
 7)Name is not necessary
 8)Now control your pc
 9)You can change your ip address again 
 from setting-ip setting.
